scene_description_enriched: A bishop, identifiable by his mitre and vestments, is depicted kneeling and reading from a book placed on a lectern. The scene takes place within an architectural setting, suggested by the presence of Gothic windows in the background. The bishop is seated on a green cushion, with a rich red and gold cope draped over his shoulders. The overall composition is framed by an ornate floral border, typical of illuminated manuscripts.
